text.content:
Character class provides a character’s most exciting capabilities. Materia offers fifteen classes, each of which contains numerous subclasses—all summarized below.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.xL1RnhxE3qZRDvml.JournalEntryPage.ZR7GN14L9OzoBpnX]{Artificer}

Masters of invention, artificers use ingenuity and magic to unlock extraordinary capabilities in objects.

Subclasses:

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.xL1RnhxE3qZRDvml.JournalEntryPage.qNbZBg3nesuzmTFG]{Alchemist}

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.xL1RnhxE3qZRDvml.JournalEntryPage.7JU24wXFLeRzr9lE]{Armorer}
